name: money-printer-server
description: Command runner for the Money Printer server project

scripts.test: docker exec --tty $(docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "MP_ENVIRONMENT=test PYTHONPATH=src python bin/dev/test.py"
scripts.test:focus: docker exec --tty $(docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "MP_ENVIRONMENT=test PYTHONPATH=src pytest -n 1 -m focus --cov-config=.coveragerc --cov=src --cov-report term:skip-covered src/"
scripts.db:migrate: docker exec --tty $(docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic revision --autogenerate -m "$npm_config_name"
scripts.db:update: docker exec --tty $(docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic upgrade head"
scripts.db:test:update: docker exec --tty $(docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=test alembic upgrade head"

author: Tim Gittos
